extensionAttribute.description: Checks for ESET NOD32 Antivirus.app in the Applications folder, if yes then YES if no then NO.
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac:
#!/bin/sh
if [ -e /Applications/ESET\ NOD32\ Antivirus.app ]; then result="YES" # else result="NO" fi echo "<result>$result</result>" exit 0
